text: After May 18, 1910, the annual reports of the Commissioner of Insurance and Securities shall be printed and bound in 1 volume, and shall be ready for distribution not later than the 1st day of the next regular session of Congress thereafter.
historical:

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-268, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-201.

Miscellaneous Notes

Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-201.

DC CODE § 31-207

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Duties of Commissioner; Requirements of Industry. (Refs & Annos)
